1fc57ba6-2481-450e-aebf-44a215b103b8.name: Classroom
1fc57ba6-2481-450e-aebf-44a215b103b8.cmd:
#!/bin/bash

# URL do Google Classroom
URL="https://classroom.google.com/u/2/"

# Abre o URL no navegador padrão
xdg-open "$URL"

7d9a3168-d085-4bd3-92ba-88f983229935.name: Opencode
7d9a3168-d085-4bd3-92ba-88f983229935.description: Custom Local AI Agent and Chatbot
7d9a3168-d085-4bd3-92ba-88f983229935.cmd:
#!/bin/bash

# Mata instância anterior se existir
kill $(pgrep -f "opencode serve") 2>/dev/null
sleep 0.5

# Inicia o servidor headless (porta fixa 4096)
nohup /home/gui/.opencode/bin/opencode serve --port 4096 &>/tmp/opencode-web.log &
sleep 2

# Abre no browser
xdg-open "http://127.0.0.1:4096"
